==Translingual==
{{stroke order|type=animate}}

===Etymology===
{{Han etyl}}
{{liushu|p}}: a kneeling person, symbolic of authority.

Note that the left vertical line extends further down than the right hook; compare some forms of [[令]].

Similar shapes may also be classed under this radical, though they are of independent derivation:
* Sometimes written as {{m|mul|㔾||sprout|sc=Hani}} (e.g. [[危]], [[卷]]) – this may be a traditional variant of 卩.
* In some characters (e.g. [[卫]], from [[衛]]), the top stroke extends further to the left.
* The variant [[卪]] appears in some characters (from [[巴]]) (e.g. [[色]], [[邑]]).
